Name: Journey to Valhalla
About the game: Journey to Valhalla is a Hack and Slash adventure game. The game focuses on hardcore melee combat. The player must make their way to a place called Valhalla and face challenges along their path. Set in an environment designed with a beautiful low poly art style, the game will give the player a challenging combat experience. The world will be filled by traps and monsters that place perfectly, so expect death â€“ as it is inevitable! Journey to Valhalla was inspired by Dark Souls and Necropolis. Key Features: Challenging Combat Immersive Low poly art style Open world areas Looting different weapons and armors
